Reviews.Title: “Excellent choice for a shopping trip, and more”

Reviews.Content: pleased unpretentious hotel 5 minutes piazza di spagna recently renovated hotel staff friendly helpful value money central touristy means loud plenty eat various price ranges close proximity sights train station 5 minutes taxi found breakfast satisfying opinions definitely recommend surely rome

Reviews.Title: “Inexpensive for location. Clean & comfortable. Loved the rooftop terrace!”
Reviews.Author: Nancy_Ottawa
Reviews.Content: family run hotel met expectations inexpensive centrally located base walk major downtown tourist sites taxi airport walked nonstop 3days rome 5minutes spanish steps trevi fountain shopping district via del corso 10min pantheon 20min piazza navona colosseum simple sparsely decorated bed comfortable neighborhood appeared safe quiet staff front desk spoke english appreciate safe included breakfast served rooftop terrace fancy sitting outdoors nice touch advantage sitting outside evening glass wine deck cards
